function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Estimation of wastewater loading and population density could result in inaccurate representation of actual wastewater flows and population exposure to contaminants.","category":"Inadequate cleanliness and surface contamination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No incorporation of leakage or infiltration in the hydraulic model could underestimate the potential for pathogen transport and spread in the collection system.","category":"Inadequate cleanliness and surface contamination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of outdated or inaccurate ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to wbe for certain regions and populations","category":"Insufficient adoption of health-focused urban
